entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
